title: Delightful 3 Bed Apartment in Campbell, 1 C Garage, Private Patio!
posting_body: Spacious Downstairs Apartment, 1 Car Garage, Patio, Wood Floors, Fresh Paint!
555 Nido Drive, #1, Campbell, CA 95008 (Winchester/Budd) Spacious downstairs single story 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in a centrally located Campbell neighborhood.
The apartment features a private patio, a 1 car private garage, fresh paint, wood laminate flooring, and dual pane windows.
The eat-in kitchen has been renovated including newer white cabinets under granite counters, a refrigerator, coil-top stove with oven, and dishwasher.
The bathrooms have been updated with tile floors, newer shower enclosures with glass sliding shower doors, and granite countertops.
The master bedroom has a nice walk in closet.
The complex is located in a very central location close to shopping, banks, restaurant, movie theater, and the Winchester Light Rail.
No pets except for required service animals.
